review: Amazing to have prime movies on my tv!
author: Kell

review: Love it! Not sure why more people don't drop cable & pick up apps like Sling TV, MLB, NFL, and the streaming TV & movies through Amazon. Couldn't be more happy.
author: brandon naasz

review: With the exception that the center button sometimes pushes to easily, causing a double-click, my Fire Stick is working exactly as it should. Plugged it in and was on Netflix in no time. I love that it came logged into my account so my (Prime) watchlist is already there as well.
author: Elizabeth A. Bradshaw

review: Love it.  Very easy to use and brings a world of entertainment into the home without bothersome advertisements...
author: Dan Cole

review: I love my firestick. We used to have a ROKU, which was freezing and buffering all the time. This product doesn't do that.  Another problem I had with my ROKU was I could NEVER RWD or FF a show, without it freezing, I then had to unplug it and wait for it to reboot. With the Firestick all of those hassles are gone. I can also take it with me on vacations, since now I can hook it up to a hotel's WI-FI.
author: Maria Sampaio
